mapper.select: SELECT CM.MENU_ID , CM.MENU_NM , CM.FST_CRER_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.FST_CRER_ID), CM.FST_CRER_ID) AS FST_CRER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CM.FST_CRE_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS FST_CRE_DTM , CM.AUDIT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM CU_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.AUDIT_ID), CM.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(CM.AUDIT_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d') AS AUDIT_DTM , CM.UP_MENU_ID , CM.MENU_DEPTH , CM.MENU_URL , CM.VISIBLE_YN , CM.SORT_SEQ , CM.ETC , RM.ROLE_ID FROM CM_MENU CM LEFT JOIN CM_ROLE_MENU RM ON CM.MENU_ID = RM.MENU_ID WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY CM.MENU_DEPTH
SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ID), 0) + 1, 5, '0') AS MENU_ID FROM CM_MENU WHERE MENU_ID <> 'root'
